/>
VIII.i.1.A.1.h
.
Action to Take When the Veteran Claims Herbicide Exposure but Does Not Claim a Disability
A claim is not substantially complete if a Veteran alleges exposure to herbicides during service but does not claim SC for a specific disability.  In cases such as these, follow the procedures for handling an incomplete application at
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.b
.
Reference
:  For more information on what constitutes a substantially complete application for benefits, see
38 CFR 3.159(a)(3
)
, and
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 1.A.4.f
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) Based on Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
